movies.name: Bigil
movies.summary: This movie revolves around on how a football player sacrifices his dream for his father, who is a gangster and who also wants his son to achieve big in football. Later, he gets a second chance to achieve his dream where he needs to coach a women's football team to glory with many obstacles.

movies.name: Master
movies.summary: Master is an action film from India about a professor, JD, who is sent to teach at a juvenile reform school for three months. He clashes with an unscrupulous man, Bhavani, who controls the school's young inmates to cover up his own criminal activities.

movies.name: 7aum Arivu
movies.summary: A genetic engineering student tries to revive the skills of a past legend and use them to save India from a deadly virus attack orchestrated by China.

movies.name: Bahubali
movies.summary: In the kingdom of Mahishmati, Shivudu falls in love with a fair maiden. While trying to woo her, he learns about the conflict-ridden past of his family and his true legacy.

movies.name: Pattas
movies.summary: Sakthi is a petty thief in a Chennai slum, who learns the Adimurai, the ancient and oldest form of martial arts, to fulfil his father Velappan's destiny. Meanwhile, an evil man and his son challenge Sakthi for a kickboxing tournament, and Sakthi agrees to participate in it.
